name: smf-to-ym2151log-rust
description: Convert Standard MIDI Files to YM2151 register write logs (WASM build)

scripts.fetch-pkg: [ -f pkg/smf_to_ym2151log.js ] && [ -f pkg/smf_to_ym2151log_bg.wasm ] && [ -f pkg/smf_to_ym2151log.d.ts ] && [ -f pkg/package.json ] && exit 0; if [ -f ../../pkg/smf_to_ym2151log.js ] && [ -f ../../pkg/smf_to_ym2151log_bg.wasm ] && [ -f ../../pkg/smf_to_ym2151log.d.ts ] && [ -f ../../pkg/package.json ]; then mkdir -p pkg && cp ../../pkg/smf_to_ym2151log.js pkg/ && cp ../../pkg/smf_to_ym2151log_bg.wasm pkg/ && cp ../../pkg/smf_to_ym2151log.d.ts pkg/ && cp ../../pkg/package.json pkg/ && exit 0; fi; mkdir -p pkg && curl -fL -o pkg/smf_to_ym2151log.js https://cat2151.github.io/smf-to-ym2151log-rust/pkg/smf_to_ym2151log.js && curl -fL -o pkg/smf_to_ym2151log_bg.wasm https://cat2151.github.io/smf-to-ym2151log-rust/pkg/smf_to_ym2151log_bg.wasm && curl -fL -o pkg/smf_to_ym2151log.d.ts https://cat2151.github.io/smf-to-ym2151log-rust/pkg/smf_to_ym2151log.d.ts && curl -fL -o pkg/package.json https://cat2151.github.io/smf-to-ym2151log-rust/pkg/package.json
